name: Display Color
author: Kjeld Hansen

sections.description:
Display color from color code on wordpress site.

Shortcode :

[display-color] Simply use this shortcode on any page or widget are to display this tool. It will display the color from any color code.

Widget

There will be a widget named “Display Color” in widget section. You can just drag and drop in any widget area.
sections.installation:
1. Add plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode mention in the main page to display the goods
sections.faq: Q : How to use this plugin? A : Use shortcode or widget.
